runs.comm: in the channel outside off and that's been left alone, a freehit coming as Mills has overstepped, by a mile
that's been smashed but straight to extra cover, pitched up outside off and that's struck straight to the fielder
on a good length on the off stump, rocks forward and defends it into the off side
edged and wide of Taylor at slip, Taylor's already standing a little wide, Charles chases that one in the channel, it moves away a bit, takes the outside edge and it's a boundary to third man
goodish length on the off, rocks forward and pushes that one straight to cover
short and it's there to cut, Charles cuts that hard and gets it wide of point, and also beats Oram at third man, four more
nicely driven but straight to extra cover who's a little deep in the circle, pitched on a length and it was struck sweetly on the up but to the fielder
played gently first up, on a length on the off stump, Gayle gets across and pushes that to mid-on
straying on the pads and Gayle's gentle again, but picks the gap nicely, clipped all along the group through square leg, this with a fine leg up, four more
held it back a little this time did Bracewell, short of a good length and that is turned wide of midwicket for a single
a touch too wide there and Charles mistimes an attempted drive straight to mid-off
he's played that back to Bracewell, goodish length and moving away, Charles plays loosely at that one and pops a simple catch back to Bracewell who takes it to his left, New Zealand have struck early
nips away after landing on a good length and keeps a little low, Russell, who played at it, was beaten
short of a good length outside off, Gayle plays half-heartedly at that one and it goes through to the keeper
pitched up and that's been dispatched, effortlessly, was in the slot and there was also some width and that was smashed over the bowler's head for a straight six
shortish on middle and off, turned off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
slower one on middle and off, bowled on a good length, defended gently into the leg side
mid-off is up, slower one again from Mills but poor length ultimately, lands in the slot outside off and Gayle just drives that uppishly, through the line, for a one bounce four
lovely timing, just a punch this time, Mills drags it back but Gayle sweetly punches that through cover and cover point, for a boundary
short of a good length and it's tapped back towards the bowler
Russell shapes up for a big shot there, a bit of width and he cracks that well but hits it straight to extra cover
short of a good length on middle, tries to turn it into the leg side, strikes him high on the pads
slapped, swatted, call it what you want, short of a length and he charges out of the crease to give it a good whack over the bowler's head, carries all the way

ooh, nicely played but straight to the fielder, shuffled across did Russell and clipped it elegantly off his pads but Franklin was positioned perfectly at short fine leg, and he was able to intercept that easily and clasp it in front of his face
short of a good length, Samuels dabs that into the leg side for a single
fires it quick on leg stump and he tried to clip that square, strikes him on the pads, stifled appeal but that would have gone down
beautifully timed by Gayle, just a firm push down the pitch, pitched up and he just pushes that through the line, past the bowler for a single
short of a good length on middle, knocks it down into the leg side for a single
drops that one short on middle and he ducks under that one, called a wide for height
long-on in place, pitched on a good length and it's cracked hard to Franklin in the deep for a single
short of a good length, knocks that in front of point, thinks of a single but it's not there
nicely fielded at midwicket but can't prevent the single, angling towards middle and leg and it's pushed wide of that fielder for a single
and he starts off with a no-ball as well, short and it's cut wide of point for a single, a shy at the stumps from outside the circle but can't aim correct
what a horrible delivery to bowl for a freehit, a juicy full toss on middle and leg and it's been deservedly smashed over the deep square leg boundary, his 300th six in T20s
bad over so far, down the leg side and it's been called a wide
slower one bowled full on middle and it's swung away towards deep square leg for a single this time
short of a good length, Samuels dabs that towards mid-off from the crease
on a good length, wants to clear mid-on this time but can't manage, ends up mistiming it along the ground to the fielder
slower one on middle and it allows him to clear mid-on, picks it up well, leans forward a little and smashes that over the long-on boundary
a thick outside edge this time, was trying to clear extra cover but it didn't go where intended, lands in front of third man, a single
on target, bowled on a good length on middle, opens the face a little and plays it wide of point for a single

Gayle goes, Southee gets him with a jaffa, a huge wicket, held it back just a little, slightly short of a good length on the off and it appeared to nip away, gets a faint nick as he plays for it and McCullum makes no mistake
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and defends it to point
on middle and leg and that's turned through square leg for a single, there was a chance to run back for the second but they let it be
good fielding at extra cover as it's crunched meatily on the up, Guptill palms it to mid-off and keeps them just to a single
opens the face this time and runs it down to third man for a single, Southee loses his balance after delivering and hits the ground but all's well in the end
good flight on the off stump and it's driven back to the bowler
floating it on a length outside off and it's pushed back to the bowler again
flicked away through midwicket for a single
flighted outside off and it's driven straight to extra cover
kept it flat this time, and short of a good length, quicker, comes down the track does Samuels and knocks it away into the leg side
shortish outside off and it's cut to point, good start from Hira
bowled flat from round the wicket on middle and off, dabs it towards cover for a single
short on leg and Samuels missed out there, went for the pull but was hit high on the pads
pitched up outside off and it is driven to long-off for a single

appeal for lbw, coming round the wicket, angling towards leg and Bravo tried to close the face on that one, struck on the pads, Aleem Dar thinks there's an inside edge, I thought it may have missed leg
Samuels goes big this time, swung hard over square leg and it beats the man in the deep, a welcome boundary for West Indies
this one's a slightly freakish boundary, Samuels goes over the top on the off side but didn't time that well at all, but got it into the gap between long-off and deep extra
Hira's turn to be hit this time, flat but on a length on the off and Bravo clears the ropes with a clean hit over the bowler's head, through the line
full toss on middle and it is whipped to midwicket where Taylor fields well
flighted outside off and Bravo tries to clear extra cover, but misses
flatter and quicker on leg stump, clipped away to deep square leg for a single
fired in towards middle and it's driven through to deep midwicket for a single
quick delivery outside leg stump and he misses on the sweep, called a wide
flicked away through square leg into the deep for a single
angling in towards middle, rocks forward and defends it on the pitch
short outside off, mistimes a punch wide of extra cover, gets a single
quicker ball bowled full outside off, comes down the track but hits it back to the bowler

they've played those straight hits well but Samuels can't repeat that this time, flat from McCullum but lands on a length on middle and off, Samuels goes straight down but can't connect well enough and finds Southee in the deep, who's moved just a little to his left from long-on
full toss on middle and it's pushed down to long-on for a single
strikes him on the pads but he's bowling round the wicket and that would have gone down leg
round the wicket, bowled full on middle and it's hit to long-on for a single
fullish on middle and off, comes down the track and drives it to long-on for a single
floating it on leg, turns it wide of short fine for a single
quicker and fuller on middle, drives it down to long-on for a single
smashed hard past the bowler, Hira had very little reaction time, pitched up and it was drilled back hard just over the bowler's head for a boundary
pushes this one back gently to Hira
shortish on the off and gets it to turn away, Bravo drops it onto the pitch
angles it in towards leg stump, gets a leg-bye in front of the bowler
fires it quick outside off, actually cut away after pitching, Pollard tried to open the face, missed
drives that past the bowler to long-off for a single
Goes round the wicket to Bravo and gets it to turn away just a hint, angles it in towards middle and Bravo tries to open the face with the turn but misses and off stump is pegged back
flighted outside off and it's driven through to deep cover for a single
slides that one down the leg side from round the wicket, called a wide and they pick up another run as McCullum fumbles
pitched up on middle, drives it through midwicket into the deep for a single
Hira strikes! Just a chip from Ramdin, leaned forward and pushed it uppishly towards extra cover and Taylor dived to his right to take a sharp one
pushed full outside off and Sammy gently knocks it back to the bowler
lands full outside off and it's driven straight to extra cover
quick single as he pushes it towards Taylor who fumbles to allow them a single
full toss on middle, drives it down to long-on for a single
drives it towards long-on from a single, McCullum bowling over the wicket to Pollard
flighted outside off, and Sammy drives it smooth but straight to extra cover
short outside off and it's cut away towards deep point for a single
short outside off and Pollard chops this tone towards deep point for one more
three in a row, cut down to deep point who's into the act again
edged, went straight on it appeared and Pollard opened the face on that one, short third does well diving to his left and preventing the single
short of a good length, punches that to extra cover from the crease
cut away hard, Hira dives to his left full length at point but it's well away from him, short and wide and Sammy doesn't waste it
shortish on the off, rocks back and drops it down in front of point for a single
short of a good length, defends it soundly back to the bowler
slower one bowled full on the off and it's driven straight to long-off for a single
Sammy goes over the top, not quite the right length but he was committed to the shot, lofted that over extra cover for a couple of runs
pitched up and it's driven wide of long-on for a couple of runs, Nathan McCullum runs across, cuts it off and returns a strong throw but it's too late, two taken
lovely yorker from Southee, in the blockhole on the off, dug out, just about, with a bit of an inside edge, just the single
slower one bowled slightly short on the off, crunched through point for a single
pitched on a length and Pollard swings it through square leg, Hira runs to his left, slides and returns an accurate throw
low full toss and it's flicked away down to fine leg for a single

Sammy picked the length early and connected well, but hit it to the fielder, slower one from Southee and short, Sammy pulls it hard but straight to deep midwicket where Franklin runs in and takes a well-judged catch leaning forward
Bracewell's unlucky, tried to clear that over extra cover but ended up getting a thick outside edge, lands just short of the deep point boundary
slower one bowled outside off, drops it into the off side for a single

missed run-out, cut to point and it's not the best of throws to the non-striker's end, Narine was too late to respond to Pollard's call, Bracewell covered good ground to collect the throw, dived and missed when he tried to flick the ball onto the stumps at the non-striker's end, good effort but didn't aim correct

just as well for West Indies that Narine got off strike, driven hard down the ground, that was length again and Guptill tried hard to dive to his left to stop that but his back was touching the ropes as he dragged it in

Pollard goes and West Indies are in danger of being bowled out for a below-par score here, slower from Bracewell, though again it's length, Pollard had made up his mind to clear long-off but mistimed that, got a lot of height on that one and Taylor, at extra cover, took it comfortably
drags that from outside off towards midwicket for a single
on a length outside off and Narine swings hard, gets an inside edge onto his pads, quick single
third man is up but he can't beat the gap, short outside off, played wide of point, just the single
Narine's been trying that shot each ball, the shot was probably on this time, slower one bowled short but he didn't seem to pick it, got an inside edge onto the stumps
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, defended to point
bowled full on middle and it is clipped through square leg for a single
a legcutter gone bad, tried to bowl it from the back of his hand, down the leg side, a wide
strikes him full on the pads, would have missed leg as Southee goes up, completes an excellent spell
short of a good length from round the wicket, gets a leg-bye as he tried to tap it down
that went over the stumps, was the offcutter, Badree moved way across to turn it fine, missed and it didn't miss the stumps by much
bowled by the offcutter, the slower one again and he didn't pick it, closed the face too early and he was bowled through the gate
